doc.field: Noshyign', noshyign' hushyah ts'änh tuu na'įįłąy tl'aan mänh chih ishyiit.
Noshyign', noshyign' hushyah ts'änh tuu na'įįłąy tl'aan mänh chih ishyiit.
Down, down from their house the water is flowing and into a lake, too.
